name: Rocking Horse, Rocking Animal with Realistic Sound, Stuffed Rocker for Toddlers 18M+, Soft Filling Ride on Pony, Light Brown Horse, CPC Certified
short_description: 【ANIMAL ROCKER WITH REALISTIC HORSE SOUND】Combines a traditional plush horse design with updated features such as neighing and galloping sounds when the ears are pressed (2 AA batteries required).

【DEVELOP MOBILITY AND MOTOR SKILLS】Rocking horses help baby and toddler build the gross motor skill by training their larger muscle groups,particularly their upper body strength to keep them upright on the rocking horse.Rocking animal may help kids develop their fine motor skill.While holding the handles,placing their legs and arms at the right place of rocking horse encourages the coordination between the arms,hands,legs and feet.

【IMPROVE CHILDREN BALANCING ABILITY】When play on a rocking horse or animal,the rocking movements help stimulate the vestibular system of kids,which is key part of our body to create balance.Guide kids to learn how to use the rocking horse through the movements required,after practice they may remember how their body is balancing itself.

【ROCKING HORSES CREATE A SOOTHING EFFECT】Babies prefer to be rocked back and forth by their parents.Babies often fall asleep easily in our arms or in a swinging basket after some rocking movements.A soothing effect is somehow generated to calm down your little one in the process.

【STURDY STRUCTURE AND SAFE MATERIAL】This rocking horse is made of very soft fabric and built with solid wood rails,strong metal structure and soft polyester filling inside it.All the materials are strict to the Toys Safety Standards ASTM F963 in USA.

【OTHER FEATURES】Crafted with premium light brown velvet and suede saddle, this rocking horse combines vintage aesthetics with modern safety. Assembled dimensions: 25.2"L x 10.24"W x 21.65"H,Seat height:13.78",Weight Capacity:66 lbs (30 kg) ergonomic size ensures perfect support for toddlers aged 18-60 months, while whimsical pony-inspired details spark imaginative play.

name: Spring Rocking Horse - Plush Bouncy Ride-On Toy with Fun Sounds, Wood Handles, and Adjustable Stirrups for Kids Ages 3 to 6 by Happy Trails (Brown)
short_description: BOUNCY HORSE FOR ACTIVE KIDS - Help little ones burn off some energy with this ride-on horse. Designed for kids ages 3 to 6, this toy horse includes springs for smooth bouncing and a saddle, reins, and wooden handles for balance and stability.

INTERACTIVE FUN - Install 2AA batteries (not included) under this toddler rocking horse, hit the button on the ear, and the pony makes galloping and neigh sounds, just like a real horse. These sounds make this riding horse more realistic and exciting.

STURDY AND SAFE - Count on quality metal construction and strong springs covered with plastic tubing for safe rides on this bouncy horse. The metal foot straps enable easy adjustment for personalized rides and safe galloping on this bouncing horse.

A GREAT GIFT - Give this lifelike toy horse plush to boys and girls on special occasions for an enduring gift they can treasure. The durable design with cuddly plush features make this rocking horse for toddlers both strong and memorable.

PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Metal, Plastic, Wood, and Plush Fabric. Dimensions: (L) 29" x (W) 11" x (H) 25". Maximum Weight Capacity: 65lbs. For Children Ages 3 to 5. Requires 2AA Batteries for Sound Effects (Not Included). Color: Brown.
product_description: Provide toddlers with a fun way to stay active indoors by giving them this Spring Rocking Horse Toy by Happy Trails. Featuring a soft design for comfort and a sturdy metal frame for reliable support of kids up to 65lbs, this bouncy horse toy boasts adjustable foot stirrups and hand-crafted wooden handles to keep kids well-balanced while they play and includes realistic sound effects to add more fun to rides.
